Activity: Boot up my system, check emails and internal communication channels for urgent requests or updates. Make a cup of coffee.
Review the project plan for EHR collection and influenza trend analysis, focusing on the tasks assigned to me for this week. Double-check the high-level goals.

Review the day's progress and update task status in the project management system. Prepare a list of questions for the EHR vendor.
